divs: Sighting DetailsI went on my back porch to enjoy a cigarette. I take a look up in the sky and notice a a star. I thought it was just part of a triangle shape I usally associate in the sky. Then the lower part started moving down then started to go away from the other stars. Then it vanished!
Summary: What I though was a star moved!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Stallings
This sighting has never been favorited.
